Text: So Soon in the Morning:  The lyrics contain lines from a 19th-century hymn, "I heard the voice of Jesus say", written in 1846 by Horatius Bonar:I heard the voice of Jesus say, “Come unto Me and rest;Lay down, thou weary one, lay down Thy head upon My breast.”
Triplets:<Horatius Bonar
4: O Lord, I stretch my hand to thee
